column1: Angelica was the daughter of [[Ponto Baggins II
column2: Ponto II]], the grand-niece three times removed of [[Bilbo Baggins]].<ref>{{App
column3: Baggins}}</ref> Though her relationship with Bilbo was more distant, she would call him "Uncle Bilbo". She was invited to [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]] in {{TA
column4: 3001}} and received a round convex mirror as a gift because she obviously admired her appearance.<ref>{{FR

column1: As many female Hobbit names refer to flowers,<ref>{{App
column3: Angelica]]'' is a genus of plants with medicinal, flavoring, fragrant and medicinal properties.

column1: '''[[2002]]: [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring'' (video game)]]:'''

column1: :Angelica walks around in [[Bywater]]. She is sad to see Frodo leave and complains that he is going "practically to the other end of the world" (meaning [[Crickhollow]]) unaware how right she is.
